name: state-transition-buffer
description: Does state change too quickly? With stage-transition-buffer, the minimum duration of any state can be assured.

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && jest dist/__tests__/*js
scripts.test:debug: npm run lint && npm run build && node --inspect-brk node_modules/.bin/jest --runInBand dist/__tests__/*js

author: xuan9
